extraDescription: Physical and Information Technology (IT) Security Design, as well as Technology Architect related consulting services on an as and when requested basis for the Disability and Sick Leave Management (DSLM) Transformation Project to prepare technology architectures to support the administration of the DSLM business solution and implementing required system changes.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract is a multi-year contract.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
